entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:14 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -29.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande IV Airport 06:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -29.9°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %

Dewpoint: -33.2°C

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
